bug.short_desc: Add a manual page for creating custom data-aware widgets

long_desc.thetext:
The data-binding features of qooxdoo are really great, and so are the widgets using them, especially qx.ui.list.List.
Perhaps I haven't found it yet, but it seems that there is a lack of documentation about creating custom widgets with "native" data awareness capabilities. In fact, documentation for creation of custom widgets (which extends qx.ui.core.Widget) with features such as selection management, child management, virtual widgets, etc might be very helpful (I know that they are implemented through Mixins, but they are usually designated as 'internal' and I didn't find any explanation as to how to use them).
Thanks, and thank you for the great framework! Omri Har-Shemesh
